title: Ticket #2141: [Debian] Various includes need to be changed if postgres is used
description: Various Condor tools that can potentially use Quill need to include their Quill headers from condor_contrib rather than the src directory.
remarks:
2011-May-13 11:32:21 by tstclair:
postgres should be a contrib only dep now and checking is disabled if WANT_CONTRIB is off.

2011-May-13 13:25:40 by mih:
When that was changed I tried getting rid of postgres completely (with want_contrib off), but it still needed some headers. However, I cannot provide more details on where that happened right now. Sorry.
creator: cweiss
